meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins we discovered were premedieval in origin.
meanings.sent2: The historian studied premedieval artifacts to understand the past.
meanings.sent3: The premedieval castle had secret passages that led to hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her premedieval knowledge of herbal remedies was like a lost art.
meanings.sent5: The premedieval landscape was filled with mystery and wonder.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of the time before the Middle Ages.
meanings.sent1: The premedieval architecture showcased intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: Legends of dragons were common in premedieval folklore.
meanings.sent3: The premedieval feast was a grand affair with music and dancing.
meanings.sent4: His premedieval sword was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The premedieval tapestries depicted scenes of battles and royalty.
